## SendableMoneyp interface

Send Moneyp transactions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SendableMoneyp<R = unknown, S = unknown> extends _SendableFrom<TransactableMoneyp, R, S> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> \_SendableFrom&lt;[TransactableMoneyp](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.md)<!-- -->, R, S&gt;

## Remarks

The functions return an object implementing [SentMoneypTransaction](./lib-base.sentmoneyptransaction.md)<!-- -->, which can be used to monitor the transaction and get its details when it succeeds.

Implemented by [SendableBitcoinsMoneyp](./lib-ethers.sendablebitcoinsmoneyp.md)<!-- -->.

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [adjustVault(params, maxBorrowingRate)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.adjustvault.md) | Adjust existing Vault by changing its collateral, debt, or both. |
|  [approveRskSwapTokens(allowance)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.approverskswaptokens.md) | Allow the liquidity mining contract to use Uniswap RBTC/BPD LP tokens for [staking](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.stakerskswaptokens.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [borrowBPD(amount, maxBorrowingRate)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.borrowbpd.md) | Adjust existing Vault by borrowing more BPD. |
|  [claimCollateralSurplus()](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.claimcollateralsurplus.md) | Claim leftover collateral after a liquidation or redemption. |
|  [closeVault()](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.closevault.md) | Close existing Vault by repaying all debt and withdrawing all collateral. |
|  [depositBPDInStabilityPool(amount, frontendTag)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.depositbpdinstabilitypool.md) | Make a new Stability Deposit, or top up existing one. |
|  [depositCollateral(amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.depositcollateral.md) | Adjust existing Vault by depositing more collateral. |
|  [exitLiquidityMining()](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.exitliquiditymining.md) | Withdraw all staked LP tokens from liquidity mining and claim reward. |
|  [liquidate(address)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.liquidate.md) | Liquidate one or more undercollateralized Vaults. |
|  [liquidateUpTo(maximumNumberOfVaultsToLiquidate)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.liquidateupto.md) | Liquidate the least collateralized Vaults up to a maximum number. |
|  [openVault(params, maxBorrowingRate)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.openvault.md) | Open a new Vault by depositing collateral and borrowing BPD. |
|  [redeemBPD(amount, maxRedemptionRate)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.redeembpd.md) | Redeem BPD to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value. |
|  [registerFrontend(kickbackRate)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.registerfrontend.md) | Register current wallet address as a Moneyp frontend. |
|  [repayBPD(amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.repaybpd.md) | Adjust existing Vault by repaying some of its debt. |
|  [sendBPD(toAddress, amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.sendbpd.md) | Send BPD tokens to an address. |
|  [sendMP(toAddress, amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.sendmp.md) | Send MP tokens to an address. |
|  [stakeMP(amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.stakemp.md) | Stake MP to start earning fee revenue or increase existing stake. |
|  [stakeRskSwapTokens(amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.stakerskswaptokens.md) | Stake Uniswap RBTC/BPD LP tokens to participate in liquidity mining and earn MP. |
|  [transferCollateralGainToVault()](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.transfercollateralgaintovault.md) | Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Vault. |
|  [unstakeMP(amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.unstakemp.md) | Withdraw MP from staking. |
|  [unstakeRskSwapTokens(amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.unstakerskswaptokens.md) | Withdraw Uniswap RBTC/BPD LP tokens from liquidity mining. |
|  [withdrawBPDFromStabilityPool(amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.withdrawbpdfromstabilitypool.md) | Withdraw BPD from Stability Deposit. |
|  [withdrawCollateral(amount)](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.withdrawcollateral.md) | Adjust existing Vault by withdrawing some of its collateral. |
|  [withdrawGainsFromStabilityPool()](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.withdrawgainsfromstabilitypool.md) | Withdraw [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [MP reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.mpreward.md) from Stability Deposit. |
|  [withdrawGainsFromStaking()](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.withdrawgainsfromstaking.md) | Withdraw [collateral gain](./lib-base.mpstake.collateralgain.md) and [BPD gain](./lib-base.mpstake.bpdgain.md) from MP stake. |
|  [withdrawMPRewardFromLiquidityMining()](./lib-base.sendablemoneyp.withdrawmprewardfromliquiditymining.md) | Withdraw MP that has been earned by mining liquidity. |
